A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A very different tone from the other\, recent Star Wars films\, The Last Jedi is a disappointing example of a Star Wars film attempting to be something it is not.  Strange wannabe-Guardians-of-the Galaxy/Marvel humor mixed in with tacky\, unnecessary\, and some outright dumb plot choices make this a film that appears to be pandering to a very basic and simple audience (when\, in fact\, most movie-goers are not so basic and simple) at the sacrifice of making a good movie.
